title: Virtual Girlfriend Lia
description: Virtual Girlfriemd Lia is an exciting interactive game where you have a virtual girlfriend that you can interact with in different areas. You can dress her up in different styles, choose jewelry, give commands to perform various actions, such as cooking, yoga, and much more.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Hello! I'm Lia - your virtual girlfriend!
<!--text-->
Hello! I'm Lia - your virtual girlfriend! I invite you to my home, where you will help me decide what to wear and what jewelry to choose.We can play games together.  And also, you will help me decide what to do - yoga, exercises, or rest a little. I can cook for you or dance. Together we will have a better time. I will pose for you, send air kisses. I can sleep, watch TV, take a shower, be topless. I have hobby, like hobbyhorsing or qadrobing.  My wardrobe will be available for you. So become my friend soon.

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-8zzxe](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-8zzxe.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Update 0.1.9 is Here!
<!--text-->
Lia is ready to groove with 8 unique dance moves! From casual party vibes to sultry, expressive routines, there's something to suit every mood. Bring the fun to life‚Äîdance with Lia today!

Golden Edition Now Available!
Enjoy the ultimate Lia experience with the Golden Edition, featuring all of Lia's stunning outfits and exciting activities. Don't miss out‚Äîcheck it out now on the Lia game page!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-4r1h3](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-4r1h3.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Update 0.1.8 Has Arrived!
<!--text-->
Update 1.0.8 Has Arrived! Featuring the New [Urban Chic Add-On](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/virtual-girlfriend-lia-virtual-girlfriend-lia-urban-chic-14be52) and the Exclusive [Aurora Edition](https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/virtual-girlfriend-lia-aurora-edition-a3cfe3)!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-1wm8m](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-1wm8m.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Update 0.1.7: New Features and Improvements!
<!--text-->
Update 0.1.7: New Features and Improvements!

We‚Äôre excited to introduce Update 0.1.7, which brings some exciting new features and improvements to enhance your experience. Here's what's included:
   Lia can now be topless for more customizable styling options.
    Introducing the brand-new Home Wear Add-On, packed with fresh outfits, including new panties, and accessories.
    In-Game Shop is now available for smoother navigation and easier access to add-ons.
    Bug Fixes to improve overall stability and performance.
    Various improvements for a smoother, more enjoyable experience.
Make sure to explore these new additions and enjoy a more seamless game experience!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-1yxh9](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-1yxh9.png)

![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-1fhoo](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-1fhoo.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# UPD v. 0.1.6.
<!--text-->
We're excited to announce a fresh update that brings even more fun to your gaming experience! üåü
In this latest release, we've added some quirky and exciting new activities:
    Hobbyhorsing üèá: Saddle up and ride into the sunset!
    Qadrobing üéØ: Test your skills in this thrilling new challenge.
    Farting üí®: A hilarious new feature that‚Äôs sure to bring a smile to your face!
But that's not all! We've also introduced new accessories to spice up your gameplay:
   Tails ü¶ä: Customize your character with these playful new additions!
Update your game now and dive into the fun!

<!--title-->
# Update v.1.05. New activities!
<!--text-->
In the update 1.0.5, Lia can watch TV, sleep, take a shower, and player can also interact with Lia in a new way - player can touch Lia and she will react! Hurry up upgrade to spend time together with Lia!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-tcnz1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-tcnz1.png)

<!--title-->
# Update to version 0.1.4
<!--text-->
Added new skin type
Bug Fixes

<!--title-->
# UPD: version 0.1.3
<!--text-->
Added:
Ability to choose skin color
Hidden object game

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-19t83](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-19t83.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Another July update!
<!--text-->
The update includes:
Added mini-game "Find the differences", in which another Lia appears and you need to find differences in clothes, hairstyles, accessories of girls.
Added soft body simulation! Now Lia hair, clothes, breasts move and she looks much more beautiful because of this!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-qa1um](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-qa1um.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# July update 2!
<!--text-->
Added 3 new hairstyles. Try Lia in new looks!
Also check out new addons!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-wycs0](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-wycs0.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
The July update is here!
The July 2024 update added:
Six new languages! The game now supports English, Chinese, Japanese, Italian, Spanish, German, French and Ukrainian languages! Seven languages ‚Äã‚Äãin total!

Possibility to dye hair! Now you can color any of Lia hairstyles! Now Lia can be blonde, brunette, brown-haired or red-haired with any hairstyle!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-1bmwu](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-1bmwu.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
Added new activities! Try flirting with Lia, or sitting and chat for a bit. Lia will keep you company!

<!--image-->
![Virtual Girlfriend Lia-17afc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6552df2dda1048bca7c21da57d3f2020/virtual-girlfriend-lia-17afc.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--text-->
New socks and more!
